title: free pitta bread
description: Speckled with oniony nigella seeds, this gluten-free flatbread is great with dips such as hummus and taramasalata or to wrap falafel or kebab. A handy recipe to have in your repertoire.
ingredients: 30g/1oz psyllium powder (available from whole food shops or specialist stores online)
750g/1lb 10oz gluten-free strong bread flour blend (such as Doves Farm), plus extra for flouring
